title: Ping has Doubled
body: I am currently using shaw as my internet provider and my ping has gone from a steady 32 to 72 in the past couple of days, and many other users in Canada are also experiencing these issues.

replies.body: yup same here and im from east coast

It sounds like your routing is taking a long way to reach the game server and resulting in increased ping.  This is something our tech team can look into for you!  When you have some time, run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)for an overview of where you're routing, and attach it in a [ticket submission](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support.  We're happy to take a look at your specific issue individually and determine possible options!
